Frequently Asked Questions

Some commonly encountered questions are addressed here. For more detailed or specific questions, feel free to submit an issue on Github.

Installation

The conda install command is taking a long time. Why?

Installation of snakemake via conda typically requires a fairly long compile time. To avoid this, you can install Snakemake via Mamba <https://github.com/mamba-org/mamba>`_ (see the official Snakemake installation instructions for details).

Usage

Why I am encountering a MissingInputException when I try to run Snekmer?

Typically, this means that Snekmer is unable to detect input files, and the input files may not follow the required directory structure. For more information, including an example of the file structure needed, see Configuration.

I cannot build models correctly.
